title: Textile, 1920–30
description: Polychrome block print on tightly woven natural linen. Realistically colored blue and green peacock sits in branches of lilac. A green and blue swallow ?, purple and tan butterflies among branches and parts of other purple flowers show in incomplete repeat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-70.
